name: braillify-workspace
description: Braillify is a library for converting text to braille.

scripts.test: cargo tarpaulin --out xml --out stdout -- --skip test_by_testcase && vitest test --run && pnpm -r test && cd py-test && uv run pytest __init__.py
scripts.build: cargo build --release && pnpm -F braillify build && cd packages/python && maturin build --release --out dist
scripts.build:landing: pnpm build && (cargo test test_by_testcase || echo.) && pnpm -F landing build

author: devfive
